ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger triple sec (orange-flavored liqueur)
des: "An easy, fun concoction that tastes sensationally fruity without a strong taste of alcohol. Enjoy!"
ins: Pour the vodka, triple sec, and juice into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled glass to serve.
